home.title: Build, scale, and ship with confidence
home.description: Welcome to your new development hub — fast, flexible, and designed to empower your team at every stage.

account.title: Manage your personal account with ease
account.description: Control your account settings and manage your preferences — all from one place. We make it simple to stay organized and secure.

pricing.title: Our plans scale with you
pricing.description: Plans that empower you and your team to ship without friction. Our flexible pricing models ensure that efficiency doesn’t come at the cost of your budget.

contact.title: Let’s talk!
contact.description: Whether you have a question, need support, or want to explore how we can help your team, we’re here for you.

documentation.title: Everything you need to integrate and build
documentation.description: Explore our complete documentation, API references, and guides to help you get started in minutes.

api.title: Manage your API keys and usage
api.description: Securely generate, monitor, and revoke your API keys with ease. Keep control of your access and limits.
